title: Shattered Silence
description: A detective investigates a series of murders where the victims are found in total silence, and the killer seems to know every thought of the police.

title: The Vanishing Hour
description: People start disappearing at exactly 3:00 a.m., and an investigative journalist races against time to uncover a conspiracy spanning decades.

title: Ciphered Lies
description: A cryptographer uncovers a hidden code in world news broadcasts that could predict political assassinations.

title: Edge of Deception
description: A lawyer discovers her clients are being replaced by doppelgängers, and she must expose the truth before she becomes the next victim.

title: The Lazarus Protocol
description: A secret experiment gives people the ability to survive deadly accidents—but a rogue scientist uses it to control a group of deadly assassins.

title: Under the Crimson Sky
description: A pilot witnesses a crime in the clouds and becomes the target of an international manhunt for knowledge that could ignite war.

title: Bloodline of Secrets
description: A woman inherits a family estate, only to find a hidden room with evidence that could destroy the most powerful criminal syndicate in the world.

title: The 7th Witness
description: Seven people witness a brutal crime, but one of them is secretly orchestrating events to cover the truth.

title: Fractured Alibi
description: A detective’s own alibi is questioned after a murder happens exactly where she claims to have been, forcing her to find the real killer.

title: The Silent Network
description: A hacker discovers a covert surveillance network that monitors global leaders, and soon becomes its next target.

title: Hidden in Plain Sight
description: A journalist uncovers evidence that murders are being staged as accidents to hide the identity of a mysterious international criminal.

title: The Devil’s Ledger
description: A financial investigator discovers a ledger that implicates world leaders in a deadly conspiracy spanning decades.

title: The Final Gambit
description: A chess grandmaster is forced into a deadly real-life game where every move could cost lives.

title: Veil of Shadows
description: A secret organization kidnaps influential people and manipulates global events, while a rogue operative tries to expose them.

title: Twisted Motive
description: A profiler tracks a killer whose motives are so twisted, even the police cannot predict the next victim.

title: The Forgotten Room
description: A woman wakes up in a room she doesn’t remember and must uncover a criminal conspiracy before she disappears completely.

title: Vanishing Point
description: A train disappears without a trace, and the detective assigned must solve the mystery before it happens again.

title: Crimson Echo
description: An assassin starts leaving cryptic messages at every crime scene, and a former agent must decode them to prevent the next killing.

title: Edge of Sanity
description: A psychiatrist discovers a patient who can predict murders, but uncovering the truth slowly drives him into madness.

title: Darkwater Protocol
description: A whistleblower leaks secrets of a covert military operation, putting herself and her allies on the run from assassins across the globe.
